item.title: Building and maintaining a smart home presentation
item.description: Here is a recent recording of a new talk I recently gave at North Dallas Developers on my experiences building and maintaining a smart home. item.title: Let's talk about smart home accessibility
item.description: I define accessibility as a critical necessity to be inclusive to everyone. No matter how big or small the task, anyone should be able complete the task at hand regardless of the disability (e.g., vision, hearing, mobility, device access, language, etc).
